response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to secure such a high-quality asset at a highly competitive rate. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 900000}
